title: Houston's newest luxury middies!
posting_body: Text ID # 1484A to my cell for more info!
River Hollow is Houston's newest luxury midrise apartment community.
This prime location, just off 610 in between I-10 and US 59 in the vibrant center of Uptown and the Galleria, provides easy access to major highways, employers, restaurants, and entertainment.
Reverie at River Hollow offers exceptional interior finishes and unparalleled community amenities.
Resort Pool, Private Cabanas, Fire Pit, BBQ Grills
Social Events, Uber Waiting Lounge, Coffee Lounge
8th Fl Outdoor Views of Memorial Park & Downtown
24-Hr Strength and Cardio Center, Yoga/Spin Room
Dry Cleaning Lockers, Valet Parking, Concierge Svc
Gourmet Kitchens w/ SS Appliances, Gas Cooktop
42'' Cabinets, Pendant and Under Counter Lighting
Wood Flooring*,,Upgraded Carpet and Ceramic Tile
F/S Washer Dryer, Walk-In Shower* Private Balcony
Houston's Newest Luxury Mid Rise in Uptown
